title: pool view
posting_body: ['Schedule a Tour Today: <URL>', 'Located just south of Sunrise, The Manor in Plantation Apartments have revolutionized refined rental living in Downtown Plantation.', 'Each of our one bedroom and two bedroom luxury Plantation apartments features first-class amenities such as a stainless steel appliance package and gourmet kitchens with gorgeous European cabinetry.', 'Residents of our Plantation, FL apartments love coming home to a pet-friendly rental community that has a fantastic address nestled right between Sunrise and Davie.', "With easy access to Port Everglades Expressway and Florida's Turnpike, our apartments in Plantation, FL are perfect for commuters all across Southeast Florida.", 'If you are looking for Sunrise, FL apartments, or are searching for apartments in Plantation, FL, then look no further than The Manor in Plantation.', 'Schedule a tour of our Plantation apartments for rent and find out for yourself what sets The Manor in Plantation apart from the rest.', 'Amenities:', '-Spacious Bedrooms', '-Catering Room', '-Stainless steel appliance package', '-Billiard Table', '-Large Double Height Lobby', '-Master baths feature a 36 x 60 inch soaker tub', '-Poker Room', '-Energy efficient windows and sliding glass doors', '-European cabinetry with Ovangkol wood finish & Under Cabinet Lighting', '-Fitness Center with Advanced Cardio Equipment', '-Lakeside Gazebos', '-Uba', 'Tuba granite countertops', 'Call:', 'show contact info', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
